# Add Liquidity Rewards
  <p class="blockParagraph-544a408c" data-key="cc0f533a728746aaabef70c0c1108da7">&nbsp;</p> 
  <p class="blockParagraph-544a408c" data-key="cc0f533a728746aaabef70c0c1108da7"><img style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" src="https://global-uploads.webflow.com/5fad86e2327507cecea2d5e8/60be6af72954736aa06357d6_Binance%20Smart%20Chain%20Tutorial%20How%20to%20Participate%20on%20the%20Coin%20Market%20Cap%20X%20TENFI%20Airdrop.jpg" alt="" width="100%" height="100%" /></p> 
  <p class="blockParagraph-544a408c" data-key="cc0f533a728746aaabef70c0c1108da7">&nbsp;</p> 
  <p class="blockParagraph-544a408c" data-key="cc0f533a728746aaabef70c0c1108da7"><span class="text-4505230f--TextH400-3033861f--textContentFamily-49a318e1"><span data-key="bcc364dcf4614aa2b91f8b40ea27e32d">OasisMetaverse (</span><strong><span style="color: #2dc26b;"><a class="link-a079aa82--primary-53a25e66--link-faf6c434" style="color: #2dc26b;" href="https://app.oasiswap.finance" target="_blank" rel="noopener" data-key="8fadf18ac5ef4018b75070767c7dccb6">https://app.oasiswap.finance</a></span></strong><span data-key="6f7ea56deac348bba169563dd91d15c5">) invites you to join the OasisMetaverse ecosystem projects. </span></span></p> 
  <p class="blockParagraph-544a408c" data-key="cc0f533a728746aaabef70c0c1108da7"><span class="text-4505230f--TextH400-3033861f--textContentFamily-49a318e1"><span data-key="6f7ea56deac348bba169563dd91d15c5">You will be rewarded for completing the following tasks:</span></span></p> 
  <p class="blockParagraph-544a408c" data-key="cc0f533a728746aaabef70c0c1108da7"><span style="color: #2dc26b;"><em><span class="text-4505230f--TextH400-3033861f--textContentFamily-49a318e1">(Attention: You can choose all or one of them without any restrictions. You can also choose to provide liquidity for multiple tokens to earn more ost rewards and airdrops!)</span></em></span></p> 
  <p class="blockParagraph-544a408c" data-key="cc0f533a728746aaabef70c0c1108da7">&nbsp;</p> 
  <h3 class="blockHeadingContent-756c9114"><span class="text-4505230f--HeadingH600-23f228db--textContentFamily-49a318e1"><span data-key="1aa7d1de7a104f10b1d8a4cf753eb117">Task1 and Rewards+Airdrops: <strong><span style="color: #2dc26b;">Create a token and add a liquidity pool</span></strong></span></span></h3> 
  <blockquote> 
   <ul class="list-20526648" data-key="d9f1d54c7158442292319576cfa09ec6"> 
    <li class=""><strong><span style="color: #2dc26b;">Create a token and add a liquidity pool</span></strong>, and you will receive <span style="color: #2dc26b;"><strong>25% of the OST reward and 25% of the OST airdrop</strong></span> corresponding to the <span style="color: #2dc26b;"><strong>total value of the liquidity pool</strong></span>. The higher the total value of the liquidity pool, the higher the reward for OST tokens. <p class="blockParagraph-544a408c--noMargin-acdf7afa" data-key="472e5928d84741d9b6d7d76a033cf936"><span style="color: #2dc26b;"><strong>Snapshot time</strong></span>: On the 15th day of adding the flow pool, the snapshot is automatically completed by the smart contract!</p> <span style="color: #000000;"><strong><span style="color: #2dc26b;">Claim rewards/airdrops</span></strong>: <strong>Smart contract <span style="color: #2dc26b;">automatically transfers funds to your wallet immediately</span>！</strong></span></li> 
    <li class=""> <h3><span style="color: #2dc26b;"><strong>Rewards:</strong></span></h3> <span style="color: #2dc26b;"><span style="color: #000000;">OST rewards</span><strong>: 50% OST corresponding to the total value of the liquidity pool.</strong></span></li> 
    <li class=""> <h3><strong><span style="color: #2dc26b;">Tutorials:</span></strong></h3> <p class="blockParagraph-544a408c--noMargin-acdf7afa" data-key="472e5928d84741d9b6d7d76a033cf936"><span style="color: #000000;">How to creat a BSC token? <span style="color: #2dc26b;">Click Here: <strong><span class="text-4505230f--TextH400-3033861f--textContentFamily-49a318e1"><a class="link-a079aa82--primary-53a25e66--link-faf6c434" style="color: #2dc26b;" href="https://www.quicknode.com/guides/solidity/how-to-create-a-bep20-token" target="_blank" rel="noopener" data-key="8fadf18ac5ef4018b75070767c7dccb6">Create Token</a></span></strong></span></span></p> <p class="blockParagraph-544a408c--noMargin-acdf7afa" data-key="472e5928d84741d9b6d7d76a033cf936"><span class="text-4505230f--TextH400-3033861f--textContentFamily-49a318e1" style="color: #000000;">How to add token liquidity? <span style="color: #2dc26b;">Click Here</span>: <span style="color: #2dc26b;"><strong><a class="link-a079aa82--primary-53a25e66--link-faf6c434" style="color: #2dc26b;" href="https://docs.oasiswap.finance/products/OASISwap/how-to-add-and-remove-liquidity.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener" data-key="8fadf18ac5ef4018b75070767c7dccb6">Add Liquidity</a></strong></span></span></p> </li> 
   </ul> 
  </blockquote> 
  <p class="blockHeadingContent-756c9114">&nbsp;</p> 
  <h3 class="blockHeadingContent-756c9114"><span class="text-4505230f--HeadingH600-23f228db--textContentFamily-49a318e1"><span data-key="8c75cb429cae47a0a366e4f6ce33ae01">Task2 and Rewards+Airdrops: <strong><span style="color: #2dc26b;">Add Liquidity For OST/BNB or OST/USDT</span></strong></span></span></h3> 
  <blockquote> 
   <ul class="list-20526648" data-key="d9f1d54c7158442292319576cfa09ec6"> 
    <li class=""><strong><span class="text-4505230f--HeadingH600-23f228db--textContentFamily-49a318e1"><span style="color: #2dc26b;">Add Liquidity For OST/BNB or OST/USDT</span></span></strong>, and you will receive <span style="color: #2dc26b;"><strong>50% of the OST reward and 50% of the OST airdrop</strong></span> corresponding to the <strong><span style="color: #2dc26b;">total value of the liquidity pool</span></strong>. The higher the total value of the liquidity pool, the higher the reward for OST tokens. <p class="blockParagraph-544a408c--noMargin-acdf7afa" data-key="472e5928d84741d9b6d7d76a033cf936"><span style="color: #2dc26b;"><strong>Snapshot time</strong></span>: On the 15th day of adding the flow pool, the snapshot is automatically completed by the smart contract!</p> <span style="color: #000000;"><strong><span style="color: #2dc26b;">Claim rewards/airdrops</span></strong>: <strong>Smart contract <span style="color: #2dc26b;">automatically transfers funds to your wallet immediately</span>！</strong></span></li> 
    <li class=""> <h3><span style="color: #2dc26b;"><strong>Rewards:</strong></span></h3> <span style="color: #2dc26b;"><span style="color: #000000;">OST rewards</span><strong>: 100% OST corresponding to the <span style="color: #2dc26b;"><strong>total value of the liquidity pool.</strong></span></strong></span></li> 
    <li class=""> <h3><strong><span style="color: #2dc26b;">Tutorials:</span></strong></h3> <p class="blockParagraph-544a408c--noMargin-acdf7afa" data-key="472e5928d84741d9b6d7d76a033cf936"><span class="text-4505230f--TextH400-3033861f--textContentFamily-49a318e1" style="color: #000000;">How to add OST/BNB or OST/USDT liquidity? <span style="color: #2dc26b;">Click Here</span>: <span style="color: #2dc26b;"><strong><a class="link-a079aa82--primary-53a25e66--link-faf6c434" style="color: #2dc26b;" href="https://docs.oasiswap.finance/products/OASISwap/how-to-add-and-remove-liquidity.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener" data-key="8fadf18ac5ef4018b75070767c7dccb6">Add OST Liquidity</a></strong></span></span></p> </li> 
   </ul> 
  </blockquote> 
  <div class="blockHeadingContent-756c9114">
   &nbsp;
